newsitem.title: FRANCE: French shares climb further on German jobless data.
newsitem.headline: French shares climb further on German jobless data.

text.p: French shares extended their gains at midday, boosted by rises on the futures market and in bonds on the back of better than expected June German jobless data, dealers said.
"It's the German jobless figure. It was better than forecast and it is supporting bonds and the share market follows," said a broker.
* CAC-40 index up 38.87, or 1.3 percent, at 3,022.97 at 1106 GMT
* CAC-40 Aug futures 3,034 vs 2,989 at Tuesdays close.
